title: The Writer's Almanac for Sunday, March 13, 2022
description: Today in 1892 Jannet Flanner was born. She became a journalist who wrote a column called “Letters From Paris” starting in 1925, and also served as a WWII war correspondent.
itunes:author: Prairie Home Productions
itunes:subtitle: Today in 1892 Jannet Flanner was born. She became a journalist who wrote a column called “Letters From Paris” starting in 1925, and also served as a WWII war correspondent.
